properties.name: camel.component.huggingface.auth-token
properties.description: HF API token for private models

properties.name: camel.component.huggingface.auto-select
properties.description: If true, auto-select the best label (highest score) for zero-shot classification

properties.name: camel.component.huggingface.autowired-enabled
properties.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

properties.name: camel.component.huggingface.configuration
properties.description: The configuration. The option is a org.apache.camel.component.huggingface.HuggingFaceConfiguration type.

properties.name: camel.component.huggingface.device
properties.description: Device for inference (cpu, gpu, auto)

properties.name: camel.component.huggingface.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the huggingface component. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.component.huggingface.health-check-consumer-enabled
properties.description: Used for enabling or disabling all consumer based health checks from this component

properties.name: camel.component.huggingface.health-check-producer-enabled
properties.description: Used for enabling or disabling all producer based health checks from this component. Notice: Camel has by default disabled all producer based health-checks. You can turn on producer checks globally by setting camel.health.producersEnabled=true.

properties.name: camel.component.huggingface.lazy-start-producer
properties.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

properties.name: camel.component.huggingface.max-tokens
properties.description: Max tokens for generation tasks

properties.name: camel.component.huggingface.memory-id-header
properties.description: Header name for conversation memory ID (for multi-user chats)

properties.name: camel.component.huggingface.min-length
properties.description: Min tokens for summarization tasks

properties.name: camel.component.huggingface.model-id
properties.description: Hugging Face model ID (e.g., distilbert-base-uncased-finetuned-sst-2-english)

properties.name: camel.component.huggingface.model-loading-timeout
properties.description: Model loading timeout in seconds, if negative then use default (240 seconds)

properties.name: camel.component.huggingface.multi-label
properties.description: Allow multi-label classifications for zero-shot tasks

properties.name: camel.component.huggingface.oauth-profile
properties.description: OAuth profile name for obtaining an access token via the OAuth 2.0 Client Credentials grant. When set, the token is acquired from the configured identity provider and used as authToken. Requires camel-oauth on the classpath.

properties.name: camel.component.huggingface.predict-timeout
properties.description: Predict timeout in seconds, if negative then use default (120 seconds)

properties.name: camel.component.huggingface.predictor-bean
properties.description: Bean name of a custom TaskPredictor implementation (for tasks not covered by built-in predictors)

properties.name: camel.component.huggingface.revision
properties.description: Model revision or branch (default: main)

properties.name: camel.component.huggingface.system-prompt
properties.description: Initial system prompt for chat tasks (e.g., 'You are a helpful assistant named Alan.')

properties.name: camel.component.huggingface.temperature
properties.description: Temperature for sampling (0.0-1.0)

properties.name: camel.component.huggingface.top-k
properties.description: Top-k parameter for classification tasks

properties.name: camel.component.huggingface.user-role
properties.description: Role for user messages in chat history (e.g., 'user' or 'human')
